name: Kiriko
description: Kiriko Kamori is a caretaker of the Kanezaka shrine and a skilled ninja and healer. After the downfall of the Shimada, she vowed to protect her hometown from the deadly Hashimoto clan.

abilities.name: Healing Ofuda
abilities.description: Channel a burst of healing talismans that can seek targeted allies.

abilities.name: Kunai
abilities.description: Thrown projectile that deals increased critical damage.

abilities.name: Protection Suzu
abilities.description: Throw a protective charm to make allies become briefly invulnerable and cleansed of most negative effects.

abilities.name: Kitsune Rush
abilities.description: Summon a fox spirit that rushes forward, accelerating the movement, attack speed, and cooldowns of allies that follow in its path.

story: Kiriko learned the deadly art of ninjutsu from her mother, Asa. When the Shimada clan fell, the rival Hashimoto took Kiriko’s father hostage. For her safety, Kiriko moved in with her grandmother, who taught her the art of healing. Years later, Kiriko has returned home to free her community from the cruel grip of the Hashimoto.
